name: Wages and Salaries in Machinery - United States of America
description: Wages and Salaries in Machinery - United States of America. Source: UNIDO, which specializes in and promotes industrial development for reduction of poverty, inclusive globalization and sustainability of the environmental. For more information, please see http://www.unido.org/
